details.brokersummary:
Spacious new development in prime Bushwick!
Be the first to live here. Incredible 2 bedroom 1 bath with all the bells and whistles. Great shared backyard space! Laundry in the unit, dishwasher, and central AC. Top of the line stainless steel appliances. Each bedroom is on the opposite side for ultimate privacy, with a big living room/kitchen area in between. The exposed brick and beams add a dynamic element to the apartment.
The building features a gorgeous roof deck with skyline views, and comfy patio furniture for your enjoyment. Storage in the basement.
Myrtle-Wyckoff L and M trains just 1 block away. Surrounded by top rated restaurants and bars - Dromedary Tiki Bar, Milk & Pull Coffee, L'imprimerie Bakery, Boobie Trap Bar, Bushwick Burger Co, Williamsburg Pizza, and many more.
Small pets welcome No broker fee

Super sized 1 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
Big bedroom Large living area with windows Stainless steel kitchen Heat and hot water included Exposed brick
Perfect location, near all things that make Williamsburg, Williamsburg! JMZ and G trains nearby. Local hotspots such as L'Industrie Pizzeria, Pies 'n' Thighs, Vanessa's Dumpling House, Banter Bar, Nighthawk Cinema, etc
Available May 1st Small pets accepted

1 bedroom plus home office!
Located in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains. The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 smaller size bedroom.
Heat & Hot Water is included.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan! Pink Metal Bar, The Tradesmen, Baby Blues Luncheonette, Swallow Cafe, House of Yes, Roberta?s Pizza, etc around the corner!
Available June 1 Small pets OK No broker fee

Beautiful studio / 1 bath apartment in Williamsburg, prime location! This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedroom, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold. Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the JMZ trains
July 1st move in Small pets welcome

Gorgeous two bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains. Could also be used a 1 bedroom plus home office. The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious et-in style kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat & Hot Water is included and there is rooftop access. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!

Welcome to your new home at 804 Jefferson Ave!
You?ll absolutely love your new fabulous 2-bedroom home, graced with an array of modern fixtures and finishes as well as a thoughtful split-wing layout. Your 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom home is a stunning Bed-Stuy rental nestled close to restaurants, grocery stores, bars, and parks. Features of the home include hardwood floors, recessed lighting, casement windows, and in-wall heating and cooling units.
The home opens into a cozy living room and kitchenette. The kitchenette is equipped with a sleek white countertop, a mosaic tile backsplash, lacquer cabinetry, and a suite of stainless steel electric appliances from Blomberg, Frigidaire, LG, and Haier, including a dishwasher and a microwave. Your full bathroom has been upgraded with modern features including a beautiful, mosaic tile wall!
804 Jefferson is located just a quick jaunt away from all of the restaurants, bars, grocery stores, and shops that line Ralph and Patchen Avenues and Malcolm X Boulevard. You will be just a few minutes from Broadway and very close to Reinaldo Salgado Playground and Saratoga Park. The building has an elevator, bicycle storage, a fully-equipped laundry room, a common rooftop deck with gorgeous neighborhood views, and on-site parking at an additional fee. The J and Z subway lines are only a few blocks away.
Schedule your private showing with us today!

No need to choose between Bushwick and BedStuy with this one! Live right on that line and enjoy one of the quickest growing and most popular neighborhoods today. With all the conveniences of and Broadway right outside and Myrtle Avenue just down the street, you'll have everything you need nearby. Quickly walk to a HUGE grocer (such a luxury in Brooklyn), bars and restaurants galore, and the easiest transportation ever! Conveniently located off the J and M trains as well as the B15, B38, B46, B47, and B54 bus routes. FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Excellent Natural Light! Shared Laundry Room Shared Roof Deck Bike Storage Parking (by availability) Pet Friendly for only $50/month!!

Welcome to your new home at 804 Jefferson Ave!
You?ll absolutely love your new, fabulous 1-bedroom home, graced with an array of modern fixtures and finishes as well as a thoughtful split-wing layout. Your 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom home is a stunning Bed-Stuy rental nestled close to restaurants, grocery stores, bars, and parks. 804 Jefferson is located just a quick jaunt away from all of the restaurants, bars, grocery stores, and shops that line Ralph and Patchen Avenues and Malcolm X Boulevard. The building has an elevator, bicycle storage, a fully-equipped laundry room, a common rooftop deck with gorgeous neighborhood views, and on-site parking at an additional fee. Schedule your private showing with us today!
July 1 move in Broker fee applies Pets OK for $50/mo

Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. Primo location right off the Morgan stop of the L train. - Elevator- Laundry Room- Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan- Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances- Hardwood floors- Garage under the building - Zip Cars available- Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. Quiet and efficient?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!Pets OK!note: if you can't see the video please send me a message and I'll send it over.

SUNNY 1 bed / 1 bath in an elevator building. Facing the City and the building?s internal courtyard! Tons of natural light coming into all areas of the apt. New construction built into what used to be a school attached a renovated 145yo church converted into apartments.
This spacious 1br but has beautiful finishes and lots of natural light.
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in both rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet for the bedroom
Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Laundry room Huge Roof deck Parking (based on availability) Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
NO BROKER FEE!! Just 1st and security to move in! Pets ok!
Contact us to set up a viewing right away!

ONE-OF-A-KIND 1 bed / 1 bath TRIPLEX with large private roof terrace! TWENTY NINE FOOT HIGH ceilings with original brick detail throughout and the church?s original 120-year-old hand-painted tin ceiling!! Vaulted ceilings in this historic church building give it a large open feel. Must see in person to get the full size.
If you can?t see the video please let me know and I?ll text it to you

There is an elevator to the roof shared roof deck but not to the apartment because there is no elevator in this part of the building. Up 2 flights. 4 laundry rooms , one on each floor.
Pets ok No fee . Guarantors welcome. $20 app fee Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

August 1st Move-In: Modern 1-Bedroom/ 1.5-Bathroom DUPLEX Apartment in East Flatbush, with Shared yard!
Move into this spacious, sunny apartment in a brand-new development in East Flatbush on August 1st. With two queen-sized bedrooms, full-sized closets, and a private balcony, this home offers comfort and convenience.
Apartment Features:
1 queen-sized bedrooms with full-sized closets Spacious living room with an open kitchen Shared backyard Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone countertops High ceilings and hardwood floors
Building Amenities:
Central A/C Laundry in building Shared backyard Roof access with a rooftop lounge Top-floor entertainment room
Located in vibrant East Flatbush, this apartment is close to public transportation, shops, cafes, and parks.Don?t miss out on this fantastic opportunity. Schedule a viewing today and make this beautiful apartment your new home!

Virtual tours available!
- Huge sunny living room - Newly renovated kitchen with dishwasher - Central AC - Hot water included - 3 good size bedrooms
Surrounded by a number of cool cafes, grocery stores, local restaurants, 2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and a short distance to Prospect Park. Quick commute to Atlantic terminal with endless transportation options! Take a stroll to your near by Avenues like Flatbush Ave, Rogers Ave, and Nostrand Ave that are loaded with trendy, new small business and more!

Gut Renovated 3 Bed 2 Bath available!
Incredible location, right by Prospect Park!
Amenities: -Laundry room -Access to Roof deck with furniture -Bike room - Gym located at the basement
Outside the Apartment: -Steps away from Brower Park (Museum, Public Library, Basketball Court, Skate Park) -Centrally located near the 2,3,4 and 5 trains

Amazing location blocks from Prospect Park in Prospect Lefferts Gardens. Feel the history of Brooklyn on brownstone-lined streets and in locally owned bars, restaurants, coffee shops and more. Not only will you have the chance for somewhat of a city escape, but you will still have everything you need around you with full size grocers, pharmacies, bodegas, liquor stores, retail shops, tattoo shops, whatever your heart desires! You won't be miss out on any luxuries inside your new home at The Ballgreen Complex either! Fully equipped with all a renter could need in NYC. Come on by and take a look with us!
Conveniently located off the 2, 5, and Q trains, as well as the B12, B35, B44, and B49 bus lines.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Finished Roof Deck Parking (by availability) Virtual Doorman

Come live your Bushwick LOFT DREAMS!! Offering both single floor and duplex units, 12 ? 20ft ceilings, HUGE sprawling bedrooms and floor plans, concrete and brick aesthetic, big industrial rooftop with city views, ALL the things you could be looking for in a loft are found here!
Conveniently located off the J, M, and Z trains as well as the B38, B46, B47, B54, and B60 bus lines.
Mix that with all modern renovations and amenities such as? Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher and Microwave Central A/C Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Game Room Fitness Center ?and you?ll truly have it all
